name: Home Is Where The WiFi Is
name_original: Home Is Where The WiFi Is
description:
Home Is Where The WiFi Is

By Pro Skaters

One of the best things about coming home at the end of a long day is when the WiFi connects automatically and you can decompress by surfing the web, chatting, and playing games.

Make your way home by keeping an eye on your signal strength and using the clarity of the music as your guide. 

For the best experience, please play with headphones! 

Controls: 

Movement: Arrow Keys

 Pause: P key


Credits: 

-Eleanor Jacques-Morel -Pixelart and Animation

Sarah Shin -Sound Designer and Composer

Brittni Martin -Game Designer and VFX

Jennifer Sunihara - Programmer extraordinaire

Jhayzle Arevalo - Programming wizard

Anna De Cicco - Art
